text: Robin Hood is a wooden roller coaster at Walibi Holland in the Netherlands. == Information == Robin Hood was designed by Stand Company and built by Vekoma in 2000. It has a capacity of 815 people per hour. The coaster has 2 trains, both having 4 cars with 6 seats (per train 24 people). A ride takes about 2.5 minutes and the coaster is about 1 kilometer long. The ride will close in 2018 for an RMC make-over. == References == Category:Roller coasters in the Netherlands Category:Roller coasters by name Category:2000 establishments in the Netherlands
title: Robin Hood (roller coaster)
